subtasks: Researching selling prices in different markets

Monitoring and adjusting machine controls for efficient coal extraction

Coordinating coal shipment to customers via rail
Using drawing dividers to mark metal sheets for car body parts
Operating automation tools to shape metal parts with precise force control
Managing the assembly line to build multiple cars per hour
Utilizing computer systems to input customer orders and track assembly progress
